    • Method Detail

      • caseIndex

        public int caseIndex(double isovalue)
        returns index for particular case of cube depending on vertex intensity values and isovalue
        Parameters:
        isovalue - - isosurface value at wich surface is generated
        Returns:
        int - index for particular case (used to get case specific cube surface triangle configurations)

      • setVertexDensities

        public void setVertexDensities(double[] densities)
        Sets vertex densities for cube
        Parameters:
        densities - array of length 8 containing densities on cube vertices.

      • interpolateEdge

        public org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F interpolateEdge(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F Vst,
                                                    org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F Vend,
                                                    double Lst,
                                                    double Lend,
                                                    double isovalue)
        Get interpolated edge vertex in DenseMatrix64F format
        Parameters:
        Vst - start vertex in dense matrix format (as column vector)
        Vend - end vertex in dense matrix format (as column vector)
        Lst - density value of start vertex
        Lend - density value of end vertex
        isovalue - isosurface value
        Returns:
        DenseMatrix64F interpolated vertex coordinates in DenseMatrix64F format
